meta.title: From I LOVE YOU to MAN
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Welcome to **RUDDLE**! This week we're rebranding as the only Paul Rudd-themed daily word game. Today's game is about I Love You, Man, the movie that gave us the term 'jobin', 'totes magoats', and 'slappin da bass' — an outsized cultural impact for such a small budget comedy.

ladder.clue: Symbol that represents the middle part of <>
Remove outside letters of <> to get an organ
Remove a letter from <> to get a quality you aren't
Change one letter in <> to get a sudden movement
Replace the double letter in <> with a single letter to get a kind of person
